title: Lesson 96
paragraph: Evaluation and framing involve examining work critically, scanning details, and organizing components for clarity. Effective frameworks help understand scope and context.

words.meaning: to assess or judge the value or quality of something
words.example: The teacher evaluated each student's project carefully.

words.meaning: to construct or structure; a surrounding structure
words.example: The designer framed the argument clearly in the report.
